Name: Living Proof Jumbo Advanced Clean Dry Shampoo
Detail: Need a hard reset? This advanced dry shampoo removes oil, sweat, and odor, while adding softness and shine for that fresh-out-of-the-shower feel.
Why we love it: Don't just clean your hair, care for it! Finally, a dry shampoo that works just as well as regular shampoos.
Benefits: Instead of seeking to create the best dry shampoo, we sought to create the best shampoo...that didn't need water. This allowed us to push dry shampoo to a whole new level one that doesn t just clean hair, it cares for it. Our new delivery system starts the cleaning process with a uniform application, allowing fast-absorbing powders to soak up oil, sweat, and odor. Then, the new powder removal system easily eliminates activated powders for a fresh start. Finally, finishing and conditioning agents refresh your scalp, balance sebum levels, and leave hair soft, shiny, and more manageable. The result? A fresh-out-of-the-shower look and feel. (Yes, really.) Features: - Cleans like a shampoo for that just-washed look and feel - Actually cleans hair, removing oil, sweat, and odor - Provides conditioning benefits such as softness, shine, and manageability - Balances sebum levels, so you can go even longer between washes - Leaves no visible residue thanks to our advanced powder removal system - Improved delivery for more even distribution - Refreshes the scalp - Provides pollution protection - Silicone-free, Paraben-free, Phthalates-free, Cruelty-free, Vegan, Color safe, Safe for chemically treated hair
Directions: SHAKE CAN EXTREMELY WELL FOR MAXIMUM CLEANING RESULTS. Hold can 6-10 away from dry, dirty hair. Section and apply product in a sweeping motion. Wait 30 seconds. Remove powder by massaging and shaking at roots with fingers or brush hair. Apply more as needed, shake can again. Style as desired.
Ingredients: Hydrofluorocarbon 152a, Isobutane, Alcohol Denat., Oryza Sativa (Rice) Starch, Propane, Cyclodextrin, Zea Mays (Corn) Starch, Furcellaria Lumbricalis Extract, Hydrated Silica, Hydroxypropyl Arginine Lauryl/Myristyl Ether HCl, Tetraselmis Suecica Extract, Isopropyl Lauroyl Sarcosinate, Cetrimonium Chloride, Glycerin, Mannitol, Polyvinyl Alcohol, Disteardimonium Hectorite, Water/Eau/Aqua, Fragrance/Parfum, Citronellyl Methylcrotonate, Linalool, Citronellol, Benzyl Salicylate, Citral, Limonene.

Name: Drybar The Tress Press Straightening Iron 1"
Detail: Dual-purpose iron allows you to quickly style even the thickest hair into super-sleek straight looks or add a bit of wave or curl.
Why we love it: Reduce heat damage with this styler that straightens and smooths in a single pass!
Benefits: Titanium Technology seals the cuticle for less frizz and tons of shine while styling. Infrared Technology heats hair from the inside out to help maintain healthy locks. 1" floating plates provide constant contact with the hair to straighten in a single pass. Rounded edges allow you to easily wrap hair around the barrel for waves and curls. Digital temperature control allows for custom styling on all hair types (heats up to 450°F/232°C). Features a 60-minute automatic safety shut-off and a professional length 9 ft (2.74 m) cord. Universal voltage for overseas travel without a converter. Features: - Quickly achieve super-sleek straight hair or add waves and curl - Seals the cuticle for less frizz and tons of shine - 1" plates allow for straightening in a single pass - Rounded edges allow for easy wrapping for waves and curls - Digital temperature control - 60-minute automatic safety shut-off - Professional length 9 foot cord - Universal voltage for overseas travel without a converter
Directions: Work in 2" (5 cm) cleanly parted, brushed sections. To straighten, hold iron horizontally. Clamp hair at the root and slowly pull through to the ends, slightly beveling toward the face to prevent static. To curl, hold iron vertically. Clamp hair midway through the section, then twist the iron away from your face 180 degrees and pull forward through to the ends. The more slowly you pull, the greater the curl. For waves, pull through more quickly.

Not only is goat milk rich in lactic acid, which helps it to exfoliate dead skin cells and reveal a new layer, but it contains the same pH as human skin, which helps to keep the microbiome of your skin well-balanced and prevent visible signs of irritation, sensitivity, and premature aging. Benefits: - Combines botanical extracts with softening goat milk for pure hydration - Perfect for sensitive skin - Helps exfoliate dead skin cells and prevent visible signs of aging and irritation - Fragrance-free

Why we love it: Free stuff? We love it! This super-volumizing and conditioning primer includes a complimentary travel Tarte Lights, Camera, Lashes mascara.
Benefits: Get ready for show-stopping lashes with Tarte Opening Act Lash Primer. This ophthalmologist-tested formula contains naturally derived volumizing and conditioning agents that increase your lash volume by a remarkable 952 percent. It primes lashes by lengthening, separating, conditioning and curling, using the revolutionary 360-degree magniLASH brush. And you don't have to worry about finding the perfect mascara this lash primer also comes with a free lights, camera, lashes 4-in-1 mascara to finish your look with dramatic beauty. Features: - Dramatically volumizes lashes by 952 percent - Primes lashes for mascara - Conditions, lengthens, separates and curls lashes - Ophthalmologist-tested formula - Designed with 360 degree magniLASH brush - Includes free lights, camera, lashes 4-in-1 mascara
Directions: Apply primer before mascara, wedging the 360-degree magniLASH brush at the base of lashes and combing upward to the tip. For the perfect grand finale, finish with two coats of included deluxe lights, camera, lashes 4-in-1 mascara.
Ingredients: Water/Aqua/Eau, Ethylene/VA Copolymer, Cera Alba/Beeswax/Cire D abeille, Cera Carnauba/Copernicia Cerifera (Carnauba) Wax/Cire De Carnauba, Hydrogenated Olive Oil Stearyl Esters, Nylon-12, Palmitic Acid, Glyceryl Stearate SE, Stearic Acid, Triethanolamine, Hydrated Silica, Silica, Phenoxyethanol, Dimethicone, Hydroxyethylcellulose, Ascorbyl Palmitate, Ethylhexylglycerin

Name: Verb Curl Leave-In Conditioner
Detail: Weightlessly moisturizes, detangles and prevents breakage for hydrated, bouncy curls. Formulated with sunflower seed extract, this nourishing leave-in provides natural UV protection while guarding against dryness and color fading.
Benefits: This conditioner is formulated to bring out the natural beauty in all types of waves, curls, and coils. Formulated with sunflower seed extract, coconut oil, and shea butter, this hydrator works to deeply nurture, defrizz, and protect, revealing bouncy, defined curls that are ready for styling.
Directions: Second, third or fourth day curls looking a little rough around the edges? Lightly mist curls with water and start by applying a quarter-sized amount of Curl Leave-In Conditioner to frizzy locks, working from the ends of your hair up towards your ears. Add more product as needed for coarser curls and tighter coils.
Ingredients: Apply evenly throughout wet or damp hair, scrunching in an upward motion. Gently detangle damp curls with fingers and follow with Curl Cream.

Name: Curlsmith Detox Kit
Detail: Powerful 3-step clarifying routine that helps deeply cleanse the scalp and fortifying its protective barrier.
Why we love it: Transform a dry, flaky scalp for healthier-looking, rejuvenated curls with this kit's 3 simple steps.
Benefits: Clarifying is key for healthy hair. A regular deep, thorough cleanse is fundamental in removing dirt and build-up from the scalp. If not removed, they can clog the hair follicles and affect shedding and hair growth. However, traditional clarifying shampoos can be a bit more drying and strip hair of its natural moisture. That's why Curlsmith created their Detox System in 3 steps: - The Primer creates a shield around the hair shaft, detangling and protecting its precious moisture. - The Wash & Scrub deeply cleanses and exfoliates the scalp, melting away all dirt & build-up. - The Calming Conditioner soothes and refreshes the scalp, leaving a tingly sensation and rebalancing moisture levels. Includes: - Super Slip Pre-Biotic Primer (12 oz) - Wash & Scrub Detox Pro-Biotic (8 oz) - Post-Biotic Calming Conditioner (12 oz) Benefits: - All-in-one kit - Doesn't strip the hair of natural moisture - Stimulates, clarifies and cools down the scalp - Deep but gentle cleansing routine - Protein-free
Directions: STEP 1: Wet your hair thoroughly and apply on the scalp before your shampoo, gently massaging it in. While the pre-biotics are working, make your way down the hair lengths, finger detangling until you get rid of all the knots. Do not rinse out. Follow immediately with the Curlsmith Wash & Scrub Detox Pro-Biotic. The primer will protect your scalp while the shampoo clarifies it.
Ingredients: See individual products for ingredients.

Name: Curlsmith Hold Me Softly Style Balm Travel Size

Why we love it: Separates and moisturizes with soft hold for touchable, bouncy curls.
Benefits: This balm is a smooth whipped-cream moisturizer that enhances curls and waves achieving a natural, effortless look. It provides a very soft hold, which means you won't have any cast or crunchy residue. It's great on its own for a soft, romantic style, or if you want defined frizz-free curls you can layer it with a stronger hold styling gel. Benefits: - Soft hold moisturizer and styling cream - Enhances curls and waves - Doesn't create a cast - Protein-free
Directions: Apply after the shower. Rake and smooth the product into wet or damp hair. Wrap curls around a finger to reshape. Scrunch to encourage curl formation. Air dry or diffuse as normal. For stronger hold and definition, follow with your favorite Curlsmith styling gel.

Name: Curlsmith Bonding Oil
Detail: Weightless oil blend that targets hair bonds to seal cuticles, add shine and help hair look and feel smoother. , Size: 2 oz
Why we love it: This lightweight oil keeps hair healthy and strong and curls bouncy and shiny.
Benefits: Too many people don't use oils in their hair routines because they're worried about the results. Natural oils are heavy and can weigh the hair down. Silicone-based oils aren't curly girl friendly and they risk building up on the hair in the long run. If you're one of them, Curlsmith has the solution! Their revolutionary Bonding Oil is made of 99% natural ingredients and contains PlantSilk, a unique next-generation blend of plant-derived esters specifically designed to outperform silicones while being lighter than raw oils. This powerful formula targets hair bonds to seal cuticles and make the hair feel softer and smoother in seconds. Scientifically proven to increase shine by up to 67%! Benefits: - Bonding oil - Seals cuticles - Repairs damage - Enhances shine - Super lightweight - Protein-enriched - Made of 99% natural ingredients - Outperforms silincones while being lighter than raw oils
Directions: Use one pump per hair section. Works best when applied on dry hair. If using on wash day, apply after fully diffusing or air drying. Smooth over curls to seal in all the moisture and tame cuticles. Gently scrunch through to break crunchy gel casts and make your hair soft and bouncy.
Ingredients: HYDROGENATED ETHYLHEXYL OLIVATE, HYDROGENATED OLIVE OIL UNSAPONIFIABLES, COCO-CAPRYLATE/CAPRATE, SHEA BUTTER ETHYL ESTERS, HYDROGENATED CASTOR OIL/SEBACIC ACID COPOLYMER, PRUNUS ARMENIACA (APRICOT) KERNEL OIL, HIPPOPHAE RHAMNOIDES (SEA BUCKTHORN) FRUIT OIL*, LENS ESCULENTA (LENTIL) SEED EXTRACT, HYDROLYZED CICER (CHICKPEA) SEED EXTRACT, CHENOPODIUM QUINOA SEED EXTRACT, FRAGRANCE (PARFUM), LINALOOL, LIMONENE, GERANIOL, BENZYL ALCOHOL, CITRONELLOL.

Name: Curlsmith Bouncy Strength Volume Foam
Detail: Lightweight protein-enriched styler that provides soft hold and volume while enhancing your natural hair texture. , Size: 7.5 oz
Why we love it: This foam adds great volume, texture, and movement to curly and wavy hair.
Benefits: This weightless styler will give texture to your curls without weighing them down. Enriched with proteins, it s great for layering with other stylers, so it will help you customize your routine and add the right amount of protein for your needs. It can also be used on its own if you have a looser curl type for a more messy, lived-in look. Apply extra at the roots and diffuse with your hair upside down for an unbelievable volume boost. If you want more hold and definition, follow by smoothing your favorite Curlsmith styler on top, staying away from the root area.

Benefits: CND Vinylux Weekly Polish makes it easy to get long-wear nail color right at home! Vinylux Weekly Polish uses a two part mechanism to create adhesion without staining the natural nail. The first part is the adhesion promoters in the color coat making the color self-adhering without a base coat. The second part is the fast drying formula which is designed to further lock in the pigments on a more permanent basis as the color layer forms a film. Why we love it: Give yourself nails fit for a queen with this line of royal purple nail lacquers that boast long-lasting shine.
Benefits: CND Vinylux Weekly Polish makes it easy to get long-wear nail color right at home! Vinylux Weekly Polish uses a two part mechanism to create adhesion without staining the natural nail. The first part is the adhesion promoters in the color coat making the color self-adhering without a base coat. The second part is the fast drying formula which is designed to further lock in the pigments on a more permanent basis as the color layer forms a film. This stops any transport of the pigment down to the nail. Healthy nails without delamination or drying issues will maximize wear for one week. Vinylux Weekly Polish can be paired with the matching Shellac color for touch ups and toes. The CND Vinylux Weekly Top Coat must be used with the Vinylux Weekly nail colors. CND Vinylux Weekly Top Coat has innovative Pro-light technology with photo initiators and becomes more durable with exposure to natural light. Features: - Long-wear color - Self-adhering - no base coat needed - Natural nails will not stain - No lamp needed for curing - Pair with matching CND Shellac colors for touch ups and toes - Must be used with CND Vinylux Weekly Top Coat
Directions: Use VINYLUX as a System: start with Vinylux Color and always use Vinylux Weekly Top Coat.

Name: Alterna My Hair My Canvas Another Day Dry Shampoo
Detail: A vegan translucent & lightweight dry shampoo that refreshes & softens hair by absorbing oil. , Size: 5 oz
Why we love it: Give your look a softening refresh with a dry shampoo that's residue-free.
Benefits: My Hair My Canvas Another Day Dry Shampoo is a lightweight, non-tacky fine powder with an invisible, vegan formula that leaves no white residue and revives dirty hair. Formulated with sustainably-sourced vegan botanical caviar, this dry shampoo is hydrating, improves your overall hair appearance and smoothes the cuticle to add bounce, shine and strength. It is infused with White Charcoal, a premium grade, small pore, ubame oak charcoal powder to help absorb excess oils, toxins and irritants to instantly purify and balance. It also contains a unique blend of polysaccharides and free-radical neutralizing antioxidants. Features: - Revives dirty hair - Hydrates and improves overall hair appearance - Instantly purifies and balances - Removes excess oil - Vegan
Directions: Shake can well. Spray 8-10 inches away from dry hair. Use brush or fingers to distribute from roots to ends.

Name: Lorac Petite PRO Contour Palette
Detail: Create a defined and sculpted complexion with the Petite PRO Contour Palette. The palettes were specially curated by professional make-up artists for an effortless and simple application.
Why we love it: Sculpt your features into the perfect contoured complexion. Each trio includes two shades designed specifically to sharpen the hollows of the cheeks, hairline, nose and jawline, while the matte highlight brightens.
Benefits: The three shades work harmoniously together to achieve a naturally-chiseled look. Each trio includes everything you need to achieve dimensional complexion perfection, a contour shade (warms and adds depth), a sculpt shade (further adds dimension to the angles of the face), and a highlight shade (brightens the high planes of the face). Features: - Photo-luminescent technology smoothes out features for a complexion that appears younger and flawlessly sculpted - The buttery-soft, seamlessly blendable formula contains Marshmallow Root, Cucumber and Parsley Extract to soothe, nurture and comfort the skin - Travel-friendly, lightweight palette fits easily inside any makeup bag or purse, making it easy to do touchups on the go - Available in two shades: 1: Light-Medium and 2: Medium-Dark - Cruelty-free, fragrance-free, paraben-free, no mineraloil, certified asbestos-free talc
Directions: Using an angled brush, apply the contour shades along the hollows of the cheeks and blend up, then the hairline while blending towards the hair, next along the sides of the nose while softly blending down, and lastly along the jawline while blending down towards the neck. Then apply the highlighter to the center of the forehead, brow bone, down the bridge of the nose and the center of the chin. Blend the shades as needed to create a perfectly sculpted finish.
Ingredients: Talc, Mica, Silica, Dimethicone, Zinc Stearate, Boron Nitride, Triethylhexanoin, Kaolin, Methicone, Aqua/Water/Eau, Propylene Glycol, Phenoxyethanol, Lauroyl Lysine, Caprylyl Glycol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Hexylene Glycol, Calendula Officinalis Flower Extract, Carum Petroselinum (Parsley) Extract, Citrus Limon (Lemon) Peel Extract, Althaea Officinalis Root Extract, Centaurea Cyanus Flower Extract, Cucumis Sativus (Cucumber) Fruit Extract, Sorbic Acid, Chlorphenesin, Benzoic Acid. +/- (May Contain/Peut Contenir): Ci 77491, Ci 77492, Ci 77499/Iron Oxides. [2010-1.2].

Name: Living Proof Perfect hair Day Advanced Clean Dry Shampoo
Detail: Need a hard reset? This advanced dry shampoo removes oil, sweat, and odor, while adding softness and shine for that fresh-out-of-the-shower feel.
Why we love it: Don't just clean your hair, care for it! Finally, a dry shampoo that works just as well as regular shampoos.
Benefits: Instead of seeking to create the best dry shampoo, we sought to create the best shampoo...that didn't need water. This allowed us to push dry shampoo to a whole new level one that doesn t just clean hair, it cares for it. Our new delivery system starts the cleaning process with a uniform application, allowing fast-absorbing powders to soak up oil, sweat, and odor. Then, the new powder removal system easily eliminates activated powders for a fresh start. Finally, finishing and conditioning agents refresh your scalp, balance sebum levels, and leave hair soft, shiny, and more manageable. The result? A fresh-out-of-the-shower look and feel. (Yes, really.) Features: - Cleans like a shampoo for that just-washed look and feel - Actually cleans hair, removing oil, sweat, and odor - Provides conditioning benefits such as softness, shine, and manageability - Balances sebum levels, so you can go even longer between washes - Leaves no visible residue thanks to our advanced powder removal system - Improved delivery for more even distribution - Refreshes the scalp - Provides pollution protection - Silicone-free, Paraben-free, Phthalates-free, Cruelty-free, Vegan, Color safe, Safe for chemically treated hair
Directions: SHAKE CAN EXTREMELY WELL FOR MAXIMUM CLEANING RESULTS. Hold can 6-10 away from dry, dirty hair. Section and apply product in a sweeping motion. Wait 30 seconds. Remove powder by massaging and shaking at roots with fingers or brush hair. Apply more as needed, shake can again. Style as desired.
Ingredients: Hydrofluorocarbon 152a, Isobutane, Alcohol Denat., Oryza Sativa (Rice) Starch, Propane, Cyclodextrin, Zea Mays (Corn) Starch, Furcellaria Lumbricalis Extract, Hydrated Silica, Hydroxypropyl Arginine Lauryl/Myristyl Ether HCl, Tetraselmis Suecica Extract, Isopropyl Lauroyl Sarcosinate, Cetrimonium Chloride, Glycerin, Mannitol, Polyvinyl Alcohol, Disteardimonium Hectorite, Water/Eau/Aqua, Fragrance/Parfum, Citronellyl Methylcrotonate, Linalool, Citronellol, Benzyl Salicylate, Citral, Limonene.

					,
					      ,CND Vinylux Weekly Polish makes it easy to get long-wear nail color right at home! Vinylux Weekly Polish uses a two part mechanism to create adhesion without staining the natural nail. The first part is the adhesion promoters in the color coat making the color self-adhering without a base coat. The second part is the fast drying formula which is designed to further lock in the pigments on a more permanent basis as the color layer forms a film. This stops any transport of the pigment down to the nail. Healthy nails without delamination or drying issues will maximize wear for one week. Vinylux Weekly Polish can be paired with the matching Shellac color for touch ups and toes. , The CND Vinylux Weekly Top Coat must be used with the Vinylux Weekly nail colors. CND Vinylux Weekly Top Coat has innovative Pro-light technology with photo initiators and becomes more durable with exposure to natural light. , Features: ,- Long-wear color ,- Self-adhering - no base coat needed ,- Natural nails will not stain ,- No lamp needed for curing ,- Pair with matching CND Shellac colors for touch ups and toes ,- Must be used with CND Vinylux Weekly Top Coat,

Directions: Brow How-To Q & A with Lori Taylor Davis, Global Pro makeup artist: Start with brows or do them last? When I m doing makeup, I always trace the brows softly at first as a starting point because they help me decide on a look. Then, after I finish, I decide if I want to go bolder to work with an architectural look or leave them more natural. How do you decide on a brow that works with your makeup? I don t think your brows should compete with the rest of your face, so I won t create a bold brow when I m doing a dramatic, smoky or smudged eye. Should I amp my brows up for night? Yes, for sure. The Gloss Stick gives you that youthful sheen and depth that shows up perfectly at night.

Detail: Celebrate the Beauty of Nature. CND Vinylux Weekly Polish creates beautiful, long-wearing nail color with an innovative formula and quick application!
Benefits: CND Vinylux Weekly Polish makes it easy to get long-wear nail color right at home! Vinylux Weekly Polish uses a two part mechanism to create adhesion without staining the natural nail. The first part is the adhesion promoters in the color coat making the color self-adhering without a base coat. The second part is the fast drying formula which is designed to further lock in the pigments on a more permanent basis as the color layer forms a film. This stops any transport of the pigment down to the nail. Healthy nails without delamination or drying issues will maximize wear for one week. Vinylux Weekly Polish can be paired with the matching Shellac color for touch ups and toes. The CND Vinylux Weekly Top Coat must be used with the Vinylux Weekly nail colors. CND Vinylux Weekly Top Coat has innovative Pro-light technology with photo initiators and becomes more durable with exposure to natural light. Features: - Long-wear color - Self-adhering - no base coat needed - Natural nails will not stain - No lamp needed for curing - Pair with matching CND Shellac colors for touch ups and toes - Must be used with CND Vinylux Weekly Top Coat
Directions: Use VINYLUX as a System: start with Vinylux Color and always use Vinylux Weekly Top Coat. Do not use a base coat. A base coat will negate the performance of VINYLUX because the adhesives are in the color coat. Vinylux has adhesion promoters in the color coat making the color self-adhering without a base coat.

Name: Tarte Tarteist Double Take Eyeliner
Detail: Define eyes like a tarteist with the Tarte Tarteist Double Take Eyeliner. The triple-black, 12-hour eyeliner featuring two versatile formulas for a flawless, sculpted stare.

The longwearing liquid liner on the opposite end features a precision tartiest tip and hydrating, quick-dry formula so you can paint on pigment and create a crisp or dramatic wing. The double-ended formulas are ophthalmologist tested and vegan friendly, and you can channel your inner tarteist and pair them together for a sleek, sexy, smokey eye that wears for 12 hours - all in just two takes! Features: - Creates a wide range of eye looks with longwear 2-in-1 liquid and gel pencil eyeliner - Amazonian clay-infused gel pencil glides along the inner rim to define and tightline - Slick liquid eyeliner goes on glossy and dries instantly to a semi-matte, opaque finish - Soft-flex tip deposits even, saturated color perfect for an ultra-fine line or crisp cat eye

Inspired by best-selling shades of Tarte's cheek stains and lip tints, shades range from soft to vivid to suit a wide variety of skin tones. Features: - Long-wear cheek color - Infused with nutrient-rich Amazonian clay - Minimizes oil - Hydrates skin naturally
Directions: Talc, Zinc Stearate, Tricaprylin, Polyethylene, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Cera Alba, PEG-150 Distearate, Lanolin, Laureth-4, Tocopherol, Polysorbate 20, Tetrasodium EDTA, Potassium Sorbate, Chlorphenesin, Ascorbyl Palmitate, Tin Oxide, Mica, Carmine (CI 75470). (+/-): Iron Oxides (CI 77491, CI 77492, CI 77499), Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Ultramarines (CI 77007), Manganese Violet (CI 77742), Bismuth Oxychloride (CI 77163), Red 6 And Red 7 Lake (CI 15850), Red 27 Lake (CI 45410), Yellow 5 Lake (CI 19140), Yellow 6 Lake (CI 15985), Blue 1 Lake (CI 42090).
